original_title: L'oeil était dans la tombe et regardait Daney
overview: Through a series of text, clips, and sounds popping up on a simulated computer screen, French researcher and filmmaker Chloé Galibert-Laîné investigates the noise that terrified Daney, as well as those that have scared her; the result proving its success by, spooking us in turn.
title: The Eye Was in the Tomb and Stared at Daney
